column4: hello guys. i have a problem login in.. the password is correct, but i can't login. login manager is always presented to me everytime i keyed in the correct password. how do i fix this?
sorry this problem persists since 2 weeks ago..
i'm sorry. won't do this again..
ctrl+alt+f1 , login , sudo apt-get remove lightdm , sudo apt-get install gdm , service gdm start
